name: Short Fuse (itch)
description:
It's another 48-hour contest entry!  The theme for this one was Chain Reaction.  The Bigbux Mining Company is shutting down the mine, so it's up to you to go inside and level the place, making sure no kids can wander in and get trapped.  Along the way, you need to shoot for a high score using a combination of strategy and plain old quick thinking.  Score multipliers (like you often find in abandoned mines) and leftover gold nuggets lie strewn about to enhance your score.

* A complete level editor to craft your own wonderment

* Explosive rockets, keys, multipliers and teleporters spice up your demolition

* High score tables for each level

* Adorable old-school sound effects
